EmailTemplate.name: Intro Voicemail - OpsTech
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Account # {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - Courtesy Followup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I called today for an introduction but you were unavailable at the time.
Our team oversee's your purchasing account with Office Depot.
I am a direct contact for you here if you ever need assistance with a recommendation or to address any concerns you may have regarding purchasing.
As a courtesy, I attached our "Ready to Ship" supply list to this message for additional ease of ordering supplies that deliver next business day from our Facilities and Break-room Solutions Catalog.
If you ever have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call me. I am here to assist you with anything you may need and I look forward to working with you.
Best Regards,
